entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
